A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was ok\, but the reveal of Rey's parents was...stupid to be honest. And Luke..he felt weird. The moment of fear fueled weakness where he almost killed his nephew was so out of character. The B-Plot was slow and plodding. And I didn't much care for Rose at all.\n\nI'm a mixed bag on this film. I didn't hate it\, but I certainly didn't like it like I did TFA.
